name: @prompt-bulk-tool/backend
description: Express API Backend for Prompt Bulk Tool

scripts.copy-sql: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); const srcFile = 'src/database/schema.sql'; const destDir = 'dist/database'; const destFile = path.join(destDir, 'schema.sql'); if (!fs.existsSync(destDir)) fs.mkdirSync(destDir, { recursive: true }); fs.copyFileSync(srcFile, destFile); console.log('SQL file copied successfully');"
